amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit United States assistance to any country that consistently opposed the U.S. position in the United Nations General Assembly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, no. 26, printed in Part B, H.Rept. 106-235 tp prohibit foreign military assistance to countries whose votes in the United Nations General Assembly agree with the United States position less than 25 percent of the time and provides for waiver authority by the Secretary of State.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodling amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 256 (Roll no. 324).
